articles.content: Gian Piero Ventrone is Antonio Conte's torturer in chief, the fitness guru with a fearsome reputation charged with turning Tottenham's players into the fittest and most resilient in the Premier Leagu… [+2520 chars]

articles.author: Manuel Carmona
articles.title: Summary and highlights of Brisbane Roar 1-2 Leeds United in Friendly Match - VAVEL.com
articles.description: Leeds United claimed their second win of the preseason thanks to goals from James and Gelhardt. The Australian side battled throughout the match and came close to equalizing late on.
